data.title: Farouk Name Meaning in English & Urdu, Origin, Luck Number
data.meta_description: Farouk is a Muslim Arabic baby boy name. Its meaning is "Knowing From Right To Wrong". Farouk name origin is Arabic. Write Farouk in Urdu, Hindi, Arabic, Bangla : فروک, फारूक, فاروق, ফারুক., Baby names meaning in Urdu, Hindi
data.text:
What is Farouk name meaning, name religion, origin, lucky number and popularity?

Farouk is an Arabic name meaning "one who distinguishes truth and falsehood" or "one who differentiates between right and wrong". It is commonly given to boys and typically represents leadership and wisdom.This name is mostly used in Islamic communities, as it has origins in Islamic teachings and historical figures. Farouk was a common name among Muslim rulers and leaders in the past.The lucky number associated with Farouk is 8, which is traced back to its Arabic root. In Arabic Numerology, the value of the letters F-R-U-Q, which make up Farouk, is 8. People with this name are believed to hold the potential to achieve great accomplishments and material success.As for popularity, Farouk has been a less common name than some of its variations, such as Faruk, Farrukh or Farrokh. It is not among the most popular names in the U.S. or U.K, but it is more frequently used in Arabic-speaking countries and some African nations.
